title: Finding 19 Vulnerabilities in one Messenger
description: When I started this project, I thought there would be little to find. However, it didn't take long for my initial assumptions to be proven wrong.

title: Breaking Military Grade Encryption to Animate my Name
description: Getting into the weeds of my flashy website banner, that simulates a padding-oracle attack on AES-CBC.

title: Quantum Apocalypse?
description: NIST finalized their first post quantum secure cryptographic algorithms in August 2024. This post provides a technical intuition on the actual impact of this, going beyond the hype and buzzwords.
